content: this simple hat is a perfect introduction to knitting in the round or on double-pointed needles the bow and topknot embellishments are created with an i-cord knit in a dk or sport weight yarn use contrasting or complementary colors to add stripes and it becomes a perfect stash-buster for those odds and ends of yarns it knits up quickly as a perfect last minute gift for a cherished baby or a charity gift customize with a i-cord bow topknot or a simple knotted i-cord the pink baby cashmerino hat was embellished with hinke s just a leaf 1 thank you hinke for sharing your fun pattern ♥ 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/just-a-leaf
